org.apache.drill.exec.vector.complex

Interface RepeatedFixedWidthVectorLike

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RepeatedBigIntVector, RepeatedBitVector, RepeatedDateVector, RepeatedDecimal18Vector, RepeatedDecimal28DenseVector, RepeatedDecimal28SparseVector, RepeatedDecimal38DenseVector, RepeatedDecimal38SparseVector, RepeatedDecimal9Vector, RepeatedFloat4Vector, RepeatedFloat8Vector, RepeatedIntervalDayVector, RepeatedIntervalVector, RepeatedIntervalYearVector, RepeatedIntVector, RepeatedSmallIntVector, RepeatedTimeStampVector, RepeatedTimeVector, RepeatedTinyIntVector, RepeatedUInt1Vector, RepeatedUInt2Vector, RepeatedUInt4Vector, RepeatedUInt8Vector

    public interface RepeatedFixedWidthVectorLike
    A ValueVector mix-in that can be used in conjunction with RepeatedValueVector subtypes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allocateNew(int valueCount, int innerValueCount)
      Allocate a new memory space for this vector.

    • Method Detail

      • allocateNew

        void allocateNew(int valueCount,
                 int innerValueCount)
        Allocate a new memory space for this vector. Must be called prior to using the ValueVector.
        Parameters:
        valueCount - Number of separate repeating groupings.
        innerValueCount - Number of supported values in the vector.
